bug.author: brollb
bug.description: Although not as common, it looks like users can still lose some points when running executions that graph stuff

comments.comment: It might be better to change the metadata to a transient, inexpensive format until the job has completed (then move it to the model).
This will no longer be an issue as of v2.0.0 since it is now using a state-based approach for synchronization.
